summary: March 26 is the 85th day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text:
Ulf Bo Samuelsson  is a retired Swedish professional ice hockey defenseman and currently an assistant coach for the New York Rangers . He played several seasons in the National Hockey League  with the Hartford Whalers, Pittsburgh Penguins, New York Rangers, Detroit Red Wings, and Philadelphia Flyers. He is a two-time Stanley Cup champion, as a member of the Penguins in 1991 and 1992.
^ "Report: Rangers hire Ulf Samuelsson as assistant coach".
title: Ulf Samuelsson
